About me

My name is Artem. I was born and live in the city of Moscow. Incomplete higher education / secondary special education. By designer education. Web development and programming I take one and a half of the year. Graduated full stack developer courses from skillbox. I am engaged in layout, website development and front-end development. I typeset responsively, validly, cross-browser, using the following development tools:

  • HTML
  • CSS (Less)
  • Javascript
  • JQuery
  • React
  • Webpack,git
